hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.hs ]]; then if command -v hlint >/dev/null 2>&1; then hlint "$FILE" 2>&1 | head -20; else echo "hlint not found - install with: cabal install hlint"; fi; fi'
hooks.description: Run HLint on edited Haskell files
